title: Student Development | Office of Technology Management | University of Illinois at Chicago
text: Our office engages undergraduate students, graduate students, and post-doctoral talent in a variety of activities related to the process of commercialization.

Technology Commercialization Analysts participate in many aspects of the technology commercialization process, with a focus on screening new disclosures to the office and evaluating the commercial landscape. Working with the OTM provides valuable technology management and evaluation experience along with exposure to some of UIC’s most exciting technologies.

Commercialization analysts assist OTM technology managers in the assessment and marketing of technologies.  This involves performing preliminary market and industry analysis for the applications of new technologies, and performing prior art research for new technologies.  Commercial analysts also assist OTM technology managers with marketing activities for high potential technologies, and with generating lists of potential licensees.

Our Graduate students perform a number of duties, from finance patent searches and marketing research to business strategy. After graduation, our students have gone on to careers in the following fields.
